Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs\(phase-2\): create constitution v1.0.0 and PHR

- Created Todo Hackathon Phase II Constitution with 6 core principles
- Established spec-driven workflow, AI-generated implementation, workspace isolation
- Defined security requirements \(JWT auth, user_id filtering\)
- Documented technology stack \(Next.js, FastAPI, SQLModel, Neon PostgreSQL\)
- Added development workflow with 5-phase sequence and quality gates
- Created PHR 0001 documenting constitution creation process

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
